effects.effect: Resets the target's evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field.  A dark Pok√©mon under this effect takes normal damage from psychic moves.  This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
effects.shortEffect: Forces the target to have no evasion, and allows it to be hit by Psychic moves even if it's Dark.

moveDescription:
Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by
Psychic-type attacks. This also enables an evasive
target to be hit.
